mapper.select: select music_id as musicId, style_id as styleId, singer_id as singerId, music_name as musicName, music_length as musicLength, music_img as musicImg, music_file as musicFile, music_text_name as musicTextName, music_count as musicCount from music
select singer_id as singerId, singer_name as singerName, nationality_id as nationalityId from singer
